io.spine.client

Class TopicBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.client.TargetBuilder<io.spine.client.Topic,TopicBuilder>
      • io.spine.client.TopicBuilder

  • public final class TopicBuilder
extends TargetBuilder<io.spine.client.Topic,TopicBuilder>
    A builder for the Topic instances.

    None of the parameters set by builder methods are required. Call TopicBuilder.build() to retrieve the resulting Topic instance.

    Usage example: 

         
     Topic topic = factory().topic()
                            .select(Customer.class)
                            .byId(getWestCoastCustomerIds())
                            .withMask("name", "address", "email")
                            .where(eq("type", "permanent"),
                                   eq("discountPercent", 10),
                                   eq("companySize", Company.Size.SMALL))
                            .build();
    See Also:
    to start topic building, for filter creation shortcuts, for more details on this builders API

      io.spine.client.Topic build()
      Generates a new Topic instance with current builder configuration.
